text: Mary Flannery O'Connor (March 25, 1925 - August 3, 1964) was an American writer. Her books, include Wise Blood and A Good Man is Hard to Find. Her writing style is sometimes known as Southern Gothic. ==References== Category:Writers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:1925 births Category:1964 deaths Category:People from Savannah, Georgia Category:American novelists Category:O. Henry Award winners
title: Flannery O'Connor
